Introduction
Crustacean systematics, including phylogenetics, biodiversity and taxonomy; Oceanographic fieldwork (deep-sea benthic research); 45 deep-sea research cruises; Benthic biological research & benthic sorting lab management Marine biology fieldwork (> 400 hrs research SCUBA); Freshwater fieldwork, specialist in permanent groundwater; Data analysis for phylogenetic and biodiversity research; Digital and Vector Graphics for publication; More than 120 publications and government reports.

Taxonomic Results. Arafura Sea Biological Survey. Report on Benthic Fauna collected during R/V Southern Surveyor Voyage 05-2005 (30 April 28 May 2005)
Technical Report
Full-text available
  • Jun 2006
  • George D. F. Wilson
Summary: This survey represents the first detailed analysis of the benthos of the Arafura Sea. This tropical sea is a major connection between the Pacific and Indian Oceans, and is subject to strong tidally induced seafloor currents and typical hemipelagic carbonate rich sedimentation.
